title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1870/91 of 28 June 1991 adapting the accession compensatory amounts fixed in the sugar sector by Regulation (EEC) No 581/86
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1870/91  of 28 June 1991  adapting the accession compensatory amounts fixed in the sugar sector by Regulation (EEC) No 581/86
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 581/86 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1991. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
